text:
="preserve">Miuccia Prada (born Maria Bianchi; 10 May 1949) is an Italian fashion designer. She designs for Prada. In 1992 she started a second fashion label, Miu Miu. Prada is the youngest granddaughter of Mario Prada. She was born in Milan.
Personal life.
Prada met Patrizio Bertelli in 1977. In 1978 she married him.
